description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli altri obiettivi.
description.spanish: Obtén todos los demás logros.
description.japanese: 全ての実績を揃えた

description.english: Retrieved the money from the Horseplayer Detective.
description.italian: Hai recuperato i soldi dal detective con il vizio del gioco.
description.spanish: Has recuperado el dinero de manos del detective Moroso.
description.schinese: 向爱赌马的侦探拿到债款
description.tchinese: 向愛賭馬的偵探拿到債款
description.japanese: 馬好き探偵から借金を取り立てた。

description.italian: Hai completato il secondo capitolo.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 2.
description.japanese: Chapter2をクリアした。

displayName.schinese: 秘密报告书１“我能翻一倍”
displayName.tchinese: 祕密報告書１「我能翻一倍」
displayName.japanese: 裏・報告書１「倍にしてやるよ」

description.italian: Hai raddoppiato le tue chip a L'Amant.
description.spanish: Has duplicado tu cantidad de fichas en el club L'Amant.
description.schinese: 将在L'Amant取得的筹码增加１倍
description.tchinese: 將在L'Amant取得的籌碼增加１倍
description.japanese: ラ・マンでもらったチップを倍に増やす。

description.italian: Hai completato il quarto capitolo.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 4.
description.japanese: Chapter4をクリアした。

displayName.italian: Non si lascia nulla al caso!
displayName.japanese: 裏・報告書2「くまなくチェック」

description.italian: Hai investigato a fondo su Terasawa.
description.spanish: Has investigado a Terasawa a fondo.
description.schinese: 彻底观察寺泽的全身上下
description.tchinese: 徹底觀察寺澤的全身上下
description.japanese: 寺澤をくまなくチェックした。

description.italian: Hai completato il sesto capitolo.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 6.
description.japanese: Chapter6をクリアした。

displayName.schinese: 秘密报告书３“隐藏的才华”
displayName.tchinese: 祕密報告書３「隱藏的才華」
displayName.japanese: 裏・報告書3「秘めたる才能」

description.italian: Ti sei intrattenuto con i clienti in maniera eccelsa.
description.spanish: Has entretenido al cliente de forma impecable.
description.schinese: 潜入公关俱乐部时，接待客人表现十分优秀
description.tchinese: 潛入公關俱樂部時，接待客人表現十分優秀
description.japanese: キャバクラ潜入で素晴らしい接客をした。

description.italian: Hai completato l'ottavo capitolo.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 8.
description.japanese: Chapter8をクリアした。

description.english: Got the password right on the first try.
description.german: Das Passwort beim ersten Mal richtig eingegeben.
description.french: Mot de passe correct du premier coup.
description.italian: Hai azzeccato la password al primo tentativo.
description.spanish: Has acertado la contraseña a la primera.
description.schinese: 一次就正确回答出猜单双赌场的暗号
description.tchinese: 一次就正確回答出猜單雙賭場的暗號
description.japanese: 丁半賭場の合言葉を間違えずに言えた。

description.italian: Hai completato il decimo capitolo.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 10.
description.japanese: Chapter10をクリアした。

displayName.schinese: 秘密报告书５“英雄总是姗姗来迟”
displayName.tchinese: 祕密報告書５「英雄總是姍姍來遲」
displayName.japanese: 裏・報告書5「ヒーローは遅れてやってくる」

description.english: Saved Sugiura with less than 10 seconds left.
description.german: Sugiura in den letzten zehn Sekunden gerettet.
description.french: Sugiura sauvé avec moins de 10 secondes restantes.
description.italian: Hai salvato Sugiura quando mancavano meno di 10 secondi.
description.spanish: Has rescatado a Sugiura con menos de 10 segundos restantes.
description.schinese: 在剩不到１０秒时拯救杉浦脱离险境
description.tchinese: 在剩不到１０秒時拯救杉浦脫離險境
description.japanese: 杉浦のピンチを残り１０秒以下で救った。

description.italian: Hai completato il dodicesimo capitolo.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 12.
description.japanese: Chapter12をクリアした。

displayName.schinese: 秘密报告书６“这就是证据”
displayName.tchinese: 祕密報告書６「這就是證據」
displayName.japanese: 裏・報告書6「これが証拠だ」

description.english: Presented the right evidence to the judge on the first try.
description.german: Dem Richter beim ersten Versuch das richtige Beweismaterial geliefert.
description.french: Bonne preuve présentée au juge du premier coup.
description.italian: Hai presentato al giudice le prove giuste al primo tentativo.
description.spanish: Has mostrado las pruebas correctas al juez a la primera.
description.schinese: 从头到尾皆正确地向法官提出适当证据
description.tchinese: 從頭到尾皆正確地向法官提出適當證據
description.japanese: 裁判長に適切な証拠を間違えずに示した。

displayName.schinese: 全体工作人员向您致谢
displayName.tchinese: 全體工作人員向您致謝

description.english: Controlled the drone for over an hour.
description.german: Die Drohne über eine Stunde lang gesteuert.

description.english: Flew the drone in first person mode for 60 seconds.
description.german: Die Drohne 60 Sekunden lang in der Egoperspektive geflogen.
description.french: Le drone a volé pendant 60 secondes en mode vue subjective.

description.spanish: Has manejado el dron en primera persona durante 60 segundos.
description.schinese: 以无人机的第一人称模式连续飞行６０秒
description.tchinese: 以無人機的第一人稱模式連續飛行６０秒

description.english: Found all the stray cats while in search mode during the main story.
description.german: Alle streunenden Katzen im Suchmodus während des Hauptfalls gefunden.
description.french: Tous les chats errants trouvés en mode Recherche dans l'intrigue principale.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti i gatti randagi con la Modalità ricerca durante la storia principale.
description.koreana: 메인 스토리의 서치 모드로 모든 길고양이를 발견했다.
description.spanish: Has encontrado a todos los gatos callejeros en modo búsqueda durante la historia principal.
description.schinese: 在主线故事的搜查模式中找到所有野猫
description.tchinese: 在主線故事的搜查模式中找到所有野貓
description.japanese: メインストーリーのサーチモードですべての野良猫を見つけた。

description.english: Obtained 50 pickups in Kamuro of the Dead.
description.german: 50 Pickups in Kamuro of the Dead erhalten.
description.french: 50 éléments récupérés dans Kamuro of the Dead.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto 50 oggetti di supporto in Kamuro of the Dead.
description.koreana: KAMURO OF THE DEAD에서 체력 회복 아이템과 폭탄을 누계 50회 획득했다.
description.spanish: Has recogido 50 objetos en Kamuro of the Dead.

displayName.japanese: ドローンチャンピオン

description.english: Won first place in every D-League race.
description.german: Den ersten Platz in jedem D-Liga-Rennen gemacht.
description.french: Première place obtenue dans chaque course de la ligue de drones.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il primo posto in tutte le corse della D-League.
description.spanish: Has alcanzado el primer puesto en todas las carreras de la liga D.
description.schinese: 在Ｄ联赛的所有赛事中获得冠军
description.tchinese: 在Ｄ聯賽的所有賽事中獲得冠軍
description.japanese: Ｄリーグのすべてのレースで優勝した。

description.french: Toutes les pièces de drone obtenues.

description.spanish: Has obtenido todas las partes de drones.

description.koreana: VR 쌍륙：다이큐의 모든 코스/모든 룰을 클리어했다.
description.spanish: Has completado todas las partidas y reglas de Dados al Cubo en el Paraíso RV.
description.schinese: 完成ＶＲ双六：ＤｉＱ的所有赛程／所有规则。

description.italian: Hai provato tutti i giochi arcade.

description.tchinese: 遊玩所有大型機台遊戲
description.japanese: すべてのアーケードゲームをプレイした。

description.english: Defeated the opponent in the side case, "A Final Request."

description.italian: Hai sconfitto il tuo avversario nel caso secondario "Un'ultima richiesta".
